DefaultEvent.Description: Their guns roar, and the battle begins!

SuccessEvent.Description: You bewilder them in a drift of fog, and you're off into the zee...
SuccessEvent.Name: Not that fast, apparently

DefaultEvent.Description: Their captain's as wily as you. Too close, too late. Begin.
DefaultEvent.Name: Fast enough...

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: It's fast. How fast are you?

Description: A nimble, savage little wolf of a vessel!
Name: Pirate Steam-Pinnace
